title: LEGO Batman: The Videogame
notes: The game works great, controller is well supported. There seem to be an issue with sound loop that it keeps repeating first few seconds of every soundtrack/cutscene.

title: LEGO Batman: The Videogame
notes: Runs good. Sound loops every few seconds

title: LEGO Batman: The Videogame
notes: Set launch options to "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%" to fix music looping issues.
The only issue is with the sound looping, and that's fixed by using the launch option provided by an earlier reviewer.  With the sound fixed, runs perfectly.
title: LEGO Batman

notes: The audio did not play properly until I disabled Esync. I played the game to 100% and didn't encounter any issues. Performance is worse than native but still outside the scope of my 60HZ monitor. (2000 fps. vs 600 fps.) Controller support worked perfectly.
title: LEGO Batman
